amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception from the provisions of the bill for suits seeking monetary relief from fraudulent institutions of higher education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 223 (Roll no. 28).

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Waters, Maxine.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters, Maxine amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 223 (Roll no. 28).
